name: 终末之名 ending name
description:
■story

The protagonist of the game, "I" is the most marginal character in the class
"I" do not know how to get along with people, do not know how to interact with people
Each day is wasted, muddled through, and deeply resentful of reality
Always trying to escape reality, to have a dream that you can never wake up from

Until "She" came along
Focus on "me", accompany "me", accept "me", hold "my" hand...
My world has never been warmer

But "I" know that the real reality is harsh
Was it all a dream?
After that, what choice will I make?

■feature

This is a text adventure game that focuses on the psychological activities of the protagonist
You can see all kinds of mental activities of the hero in the game

■end

The game has three endings, two normal end and one true end
